name: Swift Hima | G11 [R.B.C.]
bio: Sup playa! I'm Swift Hima | G11 [R.B.C.]. All you need to know about me is I hate cantaloupe with a passion. When my owner isn't watching, I steal their silk scarves and use them for litter paper. I'm not sorry. I can't wait to wake you up at 4am for seemingly no reason.
